description:
The benchmark dry suit for ocean kayaking and whitewater paddling, it's made of soft, supple GORE-TEX® Pro, with cordura-reinforced seat and knees. It has all the convenience features you need (built in socks, self-draining pockets and a waterproof dropseat) and now comes in snappier colours with accents on the forearms.

  • GORE-TEX® Pro is durably waterproof and breathable
  • Factory-sealed seams for waterproofness
  • Self-draining zippered chest pocket with key lanyard
  • Flap-protected nylon zipper for lasting waterproofness
  • Competition cut underarms allow maximum freedom of movement
  • Self-draining neoprene cuffs over wrist and neck latex seals reduce abrasion and UV exposure
  • Dual-adjustment overskirt with a hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene waistband for a watertight seal to sprayskirt tunnels
  • Adjustable bungee drawcord waist prevents bagging and sagging
  • Durable nylon waterproof dropseat zip
  • GORE-TEX Cordura-reinforced seat and knee inlaid panels for increased durability
  • Built-in GORE-TEX Pro socks fit over your favourite liner socks and under appropriate paddling footwear to keep your feet warm and dry
name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Meridian Dry Suit - Women's
